## Learn 'dplyr' using gapminder dataset
```{r}
gapminder=read_csv("data/gapminder.csv")
head(gapminder)
str(gapminder)
filter(gapminder,lifeExp<29)
filter(gapminder,country=="Mexico")
filter(gapminder,country=="China")
```
